headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GENOVA, JOHN M.

lead_paragraph: GENOVA--John M.,age 59, of Jersey City, NJ and Southampton, NY and formally of Drexel Hill, PA on February 26, 2014. Son of the late Stephanie M. and John C. Genova. Beloved partner of Graham Seymour; brother of Rosemary(John) Byrne and Joyce (Joseph) Dominick. Uncle of Dennis, Kevin and Matthew Byrne and Lauren Dominick. Great Uncle of Connor, Samantha and Abigail Byrne. Graduate of Monsignor Bonner High School, Scranton University, NYU, Fordham Law. Most recently with the law firm of White & Case (New York). In lieu of flowers, contributions to the American Cancer Society are being accepted.
